templateOptions.label: Base URL
templateOptions.description: The base URL of the OrtecWS API (e.g., : https://t4e-weu-soapsvc1-p.ortec-hosting.com).

templateOptions.label: Server Name
templateOptions.description: The name of the Ortec server used in the SOAP endpoint path (e.g., : T4E_WEU_OWS_P).

templateOptions.label: API Key
templateOptions.description: The pre-shared key (PSK) used to authenticate SOAP requests to the OrtecWS API.

templateOptions.label: API Username
templateOptions.description: The username used for authenticating with the OrtecWS API (e.g., : ORTEC-HOSTING\T4E_WEU_OWS_WebS01_P).

templateOptions.label: API Password
templateOptions.description: The password associated with the API username.

templateOptions.label: Historical Days
templateOptions.description: The number of days in the past from which to import shift data. The maximum allowed by the API is 2 days. Contact Ortec if a larger window is required.

templateOptions.label: Future Days
templateOptions.description: The number of days in the future for which to import shift data. The maximum allowed by the API is 7 days. Contact Ortec if a larger window is required.
